installCommand: cd ../.. && NODE_ENV=development pnpm install && pnpm -F @ganger/auth build && pnpm -F @ganger/db build && pnpm -F @ganger/integrations build && pnpm -F @ganger/types build && pnpm -F @ganger/ui build && pnpm -F @ganger/utils build
buildCommand: cd ../.. && echo 'Starting staff build...' && pnpm -F @ganger/staff run lint && echo 'Lint passed' && pnpm -F @ganger/staff run type-check && echo 'Type check passed' && pnpm -F @ganger/staff run build
